question: Which among conclusions has been derived from the debasement of the coins and gradual disappearance of gold coins during the post-Gupta period?
option3: Money economy was gradually replaced by Barter Economy
option4: There was a decline in trade
answer: There was a decline in trade
explanation: Debasement of the coins and gradual disappearance of gold coins during the post-Gupta period indicates the Decline of Trade.
